settings.title:
WORLD’S EASIEST

CAD/CAM SOFTWARE
settings.subtext: An all-in-one software solution for your business so you can start carving in minutes.
settings.text:
Now introducing 3D Carving!

Available to Easel Pro Users

settings.title: DESIGN
settings.text: Use an assortment of intuitive tools and templates to create digital renderings of your products.

settings.title: AUTOMATE
settings.text: Easel auto-generates 2D and 3D CNC toolpaths that are optimized to efficiently and accurately produce your projects.

settings.title: CONTROL
settings.text: Easel physically controls your CNC machine to bring your designs to life.

settings.title: Ease of Use
settings.text: 3D in Easel Pro takes the guesswork out of 3D and lets you focus on bringing your 3D designs to life

settings.title: Fast Learning Curve
settings.text: With no experience required, you can be up & running and using 3D in Easel Pro in minutes

settings.title: Available to all Easel Pro Users
settings.text: No additional fees. Enjoy full access to 3D capabilities. Just import your STL files and get started.

settings.title: Make More Money
settings.text: Take your designs to the next level and earn more money by selling high-quality 3D carves.

settings.title: 3D CARVING
settings.subtitle: EASY TO USE 3D CARVING
settings.text: 3D in Easel Pro allows you to earn more money from your machine and take your business to the next level with unique, high-quality carvings. With the click of a button, import STL files and watch 3D designs come to life.

settings.title: PRO MONTHLY
settings.bottom_text: Our most flexible access and payment option.

settings.title: PRO YEARLY
settings.subtitle: SAVE 19%
settings.bottom_text: Our most popular offering works out to $19.42/month.

settings.title: CHOOSE YOUR EASEL PRO PLAN
settings.subtitle: Select the subscription that works for you.

settings.title: GET MORE WITH WITH
settings.text: Watch the video below to get an overview of Easel Pro. Learn how to design, carve and sell your products!

settings.author: STU V.
settings.text: I have zero experience or training in CNC operations. With a little trial and error, I was up and running. I now sell my products at an area farmer's market, and the response has been overwhelming. Thanks.

settings.author: ADAM B.
settings.text: Love the new STL import! Why do the "grown up" systems make it so hard? Other software makes me want to scream in frustration. Easel makes it easy. No nightmare sorting toolpaths, exporting them, ensuring your CAM is set up the same... no messing around finding open vectors. I love this!

settings.author: JOEL H.
settings.text: Easel is amazing and highly underrated. The competitive products look like somebody's highschool VB6 project, easel is beautiful and effective.

settings.author: LES T.
settings.text: Easy to install and to understand. I was impressed by the free version for the first month and that made me buy the 3 year contract.

settings.supported_hardware_subtitle_text: EASEL PRO is designed to work with over 30 types of CNC Routers
settings.supported_hardware_optimized_text: Easel is Optimized for X‑CARVE and X‑CARVE PRO.
